LanguageData.Build_RPK74M_HMC.label: Build RPK-74M
LanguageData.Build_RPK74M_HMC.description: Builds the Machine gun version of AK74M with an elongated barrel, bipod and four-row magazine with 60 rounds
LanguageData.Build_HMC_PKM.label: Build PKM
LanguageData.Build_HMC_PKM.description: Builds the PKM, a USSR general purpose machine gun. It has a 100 round magazine and fires in 20 round bursts. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x54mm R
